titleStmt.title: The design of enslaving England discovered in the incroachments upon the powers and privileges of Parliament by K. Charles II being a new corrected impression of that excellent piece intituled, A just and modest vindication of the proceedings of the two last Parliaments of King Charles the Second.
titleStmt.author: Jones, William, Sir, 1631-1682.
Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to William Jones. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Has also been attributed to Robert Ferguson. cf. Wing and DNB.
